# Create a subscription

Learn how to navigate to the subscription section and configure term settings for creating a subscription.

1.  Navigate to from the left-hand navigation to create a subscription.

    The following example shows the term settings of the subscription with an initial term set to 6 months and a renewal term set to 12 months. For detailed instructions about how to create a subscription, see Create subscriptions.

    ![](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/fe479d77-fc32-489f-9b18-8cd137c2faef?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..i9tASm8xR_xpa5oKjeaLE47ozh2lndzuVArMWPWqQk0)

2.  Do the following to see the impact on the invoicing:
    1.  Activate and save the subscription.
    2.  Renew the subscription term.
    3.  Preview the subscription with a preview date set after the start of the renewal term.
